backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing removed share‑link UI, related cleanup, and affected frontend files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and layout behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base resets.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry defining the Valentine page and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling password gate flow, proposal interaction, evasive No button, and success sequence.
Empty component file previously used for admin link notices.
frontend/src/components/CopyShareLinkAct: Empty component file formerly used for copying share links.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Password gate UX with welcome screen, password prompt, validation, and unlock callback.
frontend/src/components/RomanticSceneLay: Layout wrapper providing gradient backgrounds and animated floating hearts around nested content.
frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.t: Three‑step tap-through sequence cycling images and a final love message with preloading and keyboard support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLinkNotice.ts: Empty hook placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Provides position state and handlers to move the No button to random locations when hovered or touched.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with auth-client login, logout, identity loading, and provider setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark romantic themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Empty utility file with no implementation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine proposal app.
